Posts.Content: Don't worry. 95% women feel this because of hormonal changes in the body. Even you don't have any breast cancer symptoms. Think positive. All the best. Keep me updated after the appointment.
Posts.Title: Pain in breast when pressed

Posts.Content: 12 week is really long time, you should concern another breast cancer doctor but now as you have an appointment with them within a week, do check up. Update us after your appointment.
Posts.Title: Pain in breast
